name: <logger::Logger as log::Log>::log

spin::once::Once::<T, R>::get.doc: Returns a reference to the inner value if the [`Once`] has been initialized.

log::Log::log.doc:
Logs the `Record`.

 # For implementors

 Note that `enabled` is *not* necessarily called before this method.
 Implementations of `log` should perform all necessary filtering
 internally.

log::Record::<'a>::level.doc: The verbosity level of the message.

console::early_print.doc: Prints formatted arguments to the console.
